data.name: changelogTextBox.Text
data.value:
## Version 2.5.0.0
- Added: DXVK support. Now users could install, update and remove the latest working version of DXVK just by clicking one button! - Fixed: ThemedDialogBox didn't resize properly so modlist and application changelogs were cropped on the right side - Refactored: static class DownloadHelper was refactored for less code duplication
## Version 2.4.2.0
- Added: changelog in the Application Update and Mod Update dialog. Now users could see what exactly has changed in the last version! - Fixed: Applying LAA patch to Soulstorm.exe could cause Multiplayer Lobby List to be always empty. To fix that, user should disable LAA, but after Mod Manager version 2.4.0.0 that would not fix the issue! That bug has been fixed in this update! GOG version executable would be patched using new method while Soulstorm executable would be patched using old, simplistic but more reliable method. - Refactored: moved all LAA patch logic to another class
## Version 2.4.1.1
- Today is the sad day! Original author, FragJacker, is stepping down from being the main maintainer of the project. Looks like I would take his place until he would return - With that, autoupdates would be redirected to my repository now. That means that all new versions would be downloaded from my GitHub repository, starting from this update.
## Version 2.4.1.0
- Added new startup parameter: "-noprecachemodels". It's improves performance but team colors will not be visable on models anymore (because they couldn't be precached, duh! xD) - Fixed a bug where setting "IsGOG" was incorrectly interpreted by a UI
## Version 2.4.0.0
- PE header and checksum calculations are more advanced now. That adds support for GOG version of the game. Now users could toggle LAA flags or any version of the game! (potentionally - on ANY Windows executable!) - Added mod support for Original game (mostly for "A larger fonts") - Some code refactorings
Full changelog: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Fragjacker/DoW-Mod-Manager/master/changelog.txt
